column4: my laptop battery was loose so I took it off and put it back on, now it won't charge above 11%, when typed acpi -V in terminal, it said that it was full at 11%
that is a hardware problem, but try gently blowing on the contacts, and please say you had the good sense to shut your machine down before you took the battery out..
ok then, its either dusty or damnaged contacts, i know neither laptop of mine has a working battery now...
